about.title: About the Author
about.textOne: Evandro M Oliveira - Full-Stack Web Developer in Node.js, Express, and React. Advancing in Data Science and UI/UX Design.
about.textTwo: I developed "NewsExplorer" from back-end to front-end, hosted on Google Cloud. I transform visions into digital reality.

searchNews.title: What's going on in the world?
searchNews.subtitle: Find the latest news on any topics and save them in your personal account.
